name: Lemonruan
body:
Brief Introduction  
          Limeng Ruan is currently pursuing a B.S. Degree at Stony Brook University, NY. Limeng's coding skills range from efficient knowledge of Java to continuing studies in C++ and Javascript, and he is a passionate game designer (as well as player) who utilizes 3ds Max, Photoshop, UDK, and many other tools in game production. However, that does not mean that Limeng is limited as a Game Developer.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
